title: Pomodoro Technique
content: Split study time into 25-minute focus blocks.

title: STAR Method
content: Answer behavioral questions using Situation, Task, Action, Result.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts
content: Learn core IDE shortcuts to speed up coding.

title: API Versioning
content: Use semantic versioning and deprecation policies.

title: RADIO Overview
content: RADIO for FE SDI: Requirements, Architecture, Data, Interface, Optimizations.

title: Requirements
content: Clarify scope, users, use-cases, constraints, SLA, non-functional.

title: Architecture
content: Identify client, state, network, backend, caching, CDN, observability.

title: Data Model
content: Define entities and fields; map ownership to components; persistence strategy.

title: Interfaces (API)
content: List APIs between modules; method, params, responses, errors, contracts.

title: Optimizations & Deep Dives
content: Perf budgets, lazy load, virtualization, memoization, prefetch, a11y.
